snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel signed an order that requires the military to review and recertify personnel assigned to programs for preventing sexual assault and assisting victims.
abstract: Defense Sec Chuck Hagel signs order requiring military to review and recertify each person assigned to programs for preventing sexual assault and assisting victims; order is response to growing outrage at high number of sexual assaults, failure of military efforts to reduce the problem and inadequacies in assisting victims.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel signed an order that requires the military to review and recertify personnel assigned to programs for preventing sexual assault and assisting victims.

headline.seo: Hagel Orders Military to Retrain and Recertify Staff in Sexual Assault Programs
headline.main: In Response to Sex Assaults, Military to Review Staffing
headline.print_headline: In Response to Sex Assaults, Military to Review Staffing

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
